Package com.graphql_java_generator.domain.client.forum

Class SpringConfigurationForum

java.lang.Object
com.graphql_java_generator.domain.client.forum.SpringConfigurationForum
@Configuration
public class SpringConfigurationForum
extends java.lang.Object
This Spring Configuration class defines the Spring Bean for this GraphQL schema.
Author:
etienne-sf

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SpringConfigurationForum()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.WebClient getWebClient​(java.lang.String graphqlEndpoint, reactor.netty.http.client.HttpClient httpClient, org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.ExchangeFilterFunction... filters)
    Builds a Spring reactive WebClient, from the specified parameters.
    Note: this utility can be used if you need to create your own WebClient, for instance to add your own filters to the WebClient
    RequestExecution queryExecutorForum​(java.lang.String graphqlEndpointForum, java.lang.String graphqlSubscriptionEndpointForum, org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.WebClient webClientForum, org.springframework.web.reactive.socket.client.WebSocketClient webSocketClientForum, org.springframework.security.oauth2.client.web.reactive.function.client.ServerOAuth2AuthorizedClientExchangeFilterFunction serverOAuth2AuthorizedClientExchangeFilterFunctionForum, OAuthTokenExtractor oAuthTokenExtractorForum)
    Creates the RequestExecution for this schema.
    org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.WebClient webClientForum​(java.lang.String graphqlEndpointForum, reactor.netty.http.client.HttpClient httpClient, org.springframework.security.oauth2.client.web.reactive.function.client.ServerOAuth2AuthorizedClientExchangeFilterFunction oauthFilter)
    The Spring reactive WebClient that will execute the HTTP requests for GraphQL queries and mutations.
    This bean is only created if no such bean already exists
    org.springframework.web.reactive.socket.client.WebSocketClient webSocketClientForum​(reactor.netty.http.client.HttpClient httpClient)
    The Spring reactive WebSocketClient web socket client for the Forum GraphQL schema, that will execute HTTP requests to build the web sockets, for GraphQL subscriptions.
    This is mandatory if the application latter calls subscription.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • webClientForum

      @Bean @ConditionalOnMissingBean public org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.WebClient webClientForum​(java.lang.String graphqlEndpointForum, @Autowired(required=false) reactor.netty.http.client.HttpClient httpClient, @Autowired(required=false) org.springframework.security.oauth2.client.web.reactive.function.client.ServerOAuth2AuthorizedClientExchangeFilterFunction oauthFilter)
      The Spring reactive WebClient that will execute the HTTP requests for GraphQL queries and mutations.
      This bean is only created if no such bean already exists

    • getWebClient

      public static org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.WebClient getWebClient​(java.lang.String graphqlEndpoint, reactor.netty.http.client.HttpClient httpClient, org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.ExchangeFilterFunction... filters)
      Builds a Spring reactive WebClient, from the specified parameters.
      Note: this utility can be used if you need to create your own WebClient, for instance to add your own filters to the WebClient
      Parameters:
      graphqlEndpoint -
      httpClient -
      filters - Optional list of additional filters that will be added to the returned WebClient
      Returns:

    • webSocketClientForum

      @Bean @ConditionalOnMissingBean public org.springframework.web.reactive.socket.client.WebSocketClient webSocketClientForum​(@Autowired(required=false) reactor.netty.http.client.HttpClient httpClient)
      The Spring reactive WebSocketClient web socket client for the Forum GraphQL schema, that will execute HTTP requests to build the web sockets, for GraphQL subscriptions.
      This is mandatory if the application latter calls subscription. It may be null otherwise.

    • queryExecutorForum

      @Bean public RequestExecution queryExecutorForum​(java.lang.String graphqlEndpointForum, @Autowired(required=false) java.lang.String graphqlSubscriptionEndpointForum, org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.WebClient webClientForum, @Autowired(required=false) org.springframework.web.reactive.socket.client.WebSocketClient webSocketClientForum, @Autowired(required=false) org.springframework.security.oauth2.client.web.reactive.function.client.ServerOAuth2AuthorizedClientExchangeFilterFunction serverOAuth2AuthorizedClientExchangeFilterFunctionForum, @Autowired(required=false) OAuthTokenExtractor oAuthTokenExtractorForum)

      Parameters:
      graphqlEndpointForum -
      graphqlSubscriptionEndpointForum -
      webClientForum -
      webSocketClientForum -
      serverOAuth2AuthorizedClientExchangeFilterFunctionForum -
      oAuthTokenExtractorForum -
      Returns:
